website_summaries.verdict: A premium-level subwoofer option for people wanting a professional competition setup.
pros: High power output enhances the low end dynamics of most songs
Thick construction materials allow the speaker to run at the maximum 3,000 watts without damage
cons: Subwoofer can be heavy and awkward to install correctly in tight interior spaces

customer_reviews.title: Handles 5000 watts rms. VXF is a Beast of a subwoofer Plus Value. Oh My God!!
customer_reviews.text: So I Received my skar VXF 15 today and it is Heavy as hell!! Something close to 50 lbs. Lbs and it Replaced my 1 yr old Rockford PD3 good subwoofer 15 D2. Using a RF 1200.1. Amp to power it. The subwoofer is not broken in yet and already louder and deeper than the Rockford PD3 using 2.65 cubic square box..specs say 3.25 ported. Rockford weighs like 16lbs vs skar 50lbs. For $50 dollars more get the skar vxf instead Waaaaay better Sql/spl. Killer Value. Impressed!! Good job Skar!!! Now get me a Taramps 5k or Md 5000.1 next!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blackwhip

customer_reviews.title: Terminal broken
customer_reviews.text: So i ordered October 1st an i was supposed to have them installed today an one of the Terminals were in the box. Looks to be broke... what do i do?
customer_reviews.author: HEMIHUGHEY

customer_reviews.title: It’s all about the bass
customer_reviews.text: Dropped 2 of the 15s in my new boat with each box about 3sf and oh my it slams so hard ! Got the 4500 watt skar amp to push them .... you want bass it’s right here
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wagner

customer_reviews.title: 🔊🔊🔊😂😂
customer_reviews.text: Very big and heavy subwoofer haven't installed my system yet can't wait to get it done I'm going to post a video when I get it installed very big sub for the money
customer_reviews.author: Hosea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sub and sound quality. Bangs the mids as well as the low notes. You will need a beefy amp to push this sub to it's full potential. Will handle more than 1500RMS.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be shipped in a better box
customer_reviews.text: Hits hard had to rewire the sub because when it was shipped I think a weak person was handling this and threw it around and it snapped all my prongs but I was able to fix them and this sub hits hard very impressive
customer_reviews.author: vinny

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: great sub gets down!! can take a lot f power very underrated and very similar to the zvx. great cooling technology and its ccaw voice coil is dope!! great bank for the buck especially if you want to move a lot of air on all notes!!!
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you put them in a good box and you will love it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best subwoofers you can buy for $300 for sure but amazon messed my order up so be careful. I ordered 2 D2’s and I got 1 d2 and 1 d4.
customer_reviews.author: Clay lutz

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Bass
customer_reviews.text: VXF 15's from Skar are the best, The bass just hit so hard and deep in my Dodge Charger 2018.
customer_reviews.author: kyesene fenn

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: So I think the recent earthquake and fault line shift in California was caused by my truck. And I live in Alabama. This thing is absolutely insane when paired with the correct amplifier to push it
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Already broken. Not as good as reviews said prior to my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Handles more then 1500rms easy. These are some great subs
customer_reviews.text: Awsome subs. Handles more then 1500rms easy. These are some great subs. Lows 4 days
customer_reviews.author: Justin hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great SQ Subs
customer_reviews.text: I've got 4 of these in Rolling Thunder, they get down
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: LOOKING FOR THE BIGGEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!? STOP LOOKING BECAUSE YOU'VE  FOUND IT.
customer_reviews.text: SKAR really did a great job with these subs. by far the best subs i ever had. I can definitely agree with their description. It provides great sound quality; handling a great variation of frequencies and it hits SPL like crazy. Im running 2 of these D4 subs on a taramps bass 5k on full power and they are handling the power very well. Bare in mind 1 of these are rated to handle 1500 RMS each and im running 2 of them on 5000RMS !!!!! BIGGEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!! LITERALLY!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

product_meta.title: Skar Audio VXF-15 D2 15" 3000 Watt Max Power Dual 2 Ohm Competition Car Subwoofer
feature_bullets: Peak Power: 3, 000 Watts | RMS Power: 1, 500 Watts
3" High temperature Copper voice Coil | Sensitivity (SPL): 89.7 dB
Extremely powerful 300 oz ferrite motor | Fs: 31.4 Hz
Competition Grade Paper Cone with stitched high Roll Foam Surround
